descriptions: When? where? how? how much? how long? or how often?
Adverbs modify other words -- verbs, adjectives, other adverbs, phrases, or sentences. They express manner, place, time, and limitations.
fc_data:
Turkish adverbs suffix –CA: Onu yavaşça kardır.#
Adjectives as adverbs: güzel konuş.#
Noun –CA: kafaca en uyumlu biz değiliz.#
Time/Number –CA: aylarca seni bekledim.#
Repetitive phrases: harıl harıl ders çalışmak.#
Comparatives: çok, az, daha, en.#
Frequency: bazen, nadiren, daima, hep, her zaman.
